long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ActivateStaff Messenger offers the most efficient way to communicate with your candidates and workforce. Send direct messages, SMS, or email to reach people wherever they are.

Send blast messages to reach dozens, hundreds, or thousands of candidates at a time. Candidates' responses go into a private thread so that you can continue the conversation with each person separately.

The Chrome Extension allows you to open ActivateStaff's Messenger within your ATS so you can seamlessly communicate with candidates.

ActivateStaff is a mobile-first staffing platform that helps staffing agencies attract and retain the best talent while finding efficiencies for their team along the entire candidate journey.
